casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ahmad Jamil NICHOLSON 319A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2017 Narendra K. Ghosh, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Nicholson, Ahmad Jamil. John R. Green, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of September 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2017."
